scripts.build: father-build && npm run build:script && node ./scripts/createDistCss.js && npm run build:css
scripts.deploy: npm run docs:build && npm run zip
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:script -- --fix && npm run lint:style -- --fix
scripts.lint: npm run lint:script && npm run lint:style
scripts.beta: npm run build && standard-version --prerelease beta --release-as patch && npm run pub:beta
scripts.internal: npm run build && standard-version --prerelease internal --release-as patch && npm run pub:internal
scripts.release: npm run build && standard-version --release-as patch && npm run pub:release
scripts.fusion: standard-version --release-as patch && kraken-kit build --pub --buildCheck false --cssModule false
scripts.mpage: standard-version --prerelease mpage --release-as patch && kraken-kit build --pub --buildCheck false --cssModule false
